H0.text: Who judged Aphrodite more beautiful than Hera or Athena. Paris

H1.text: Who judged Aphrodite more beautiful than Hera or Athena. Adonis

H2.text: Who judged Aphrodite more beautiful than Hera or Athena. Eros

H3.text: Who judged Aphrodite more beautiful than Hera or Athena. Paříž

A4.text: Zeus declared that Paris, a Trojan mortal, would judge their cases, for he had recently shown his exemplary fairness in a contest in which Ares in bull form had bested Paris's own prize bull, and the shepherd-prince had unhesitatingly awarded the prize to the god.

A5.text: Paris accepted Aphrodite's bribe and awarded the apple to her, receiving Helen as well as the enmity of the Greeks and especially of Hera.
